text: Out of the Game is the seventh album by Rufus Wainwright. ==Track listing== # "Out of the Game" – 4:06 # "Jericho" – 3:44 # "Rashida" – 3:00 # "Barbara" – 3:56 # "Welcome to the Ball" – 3:26 # "Montauk" – 3:57 # "Bitter Tears" – 3:32 # "Respectable Dive" – 4:55 # "Perfect Man" – 3:58 # "Sometimes You Need" – 3:21 # "Song of You" – 4:51 # "Candles" – 7:42 ==References== Category:2012 albums Category:Rufus Wainwright albums
title: Out of the Game
